Plot: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.
Title: Life of Pi
Actors: Suraj Sharma, Irrfan Khan, Ayush Tandon, Gautam Belur
tomatoConsensus: A 3D adaptation of a supposedly "unfilmable" book, Ang Lee's Life of Pi achieves the near impossible -- it's an astonishing technical achievement that's also emotionally rewarding.
Language: English, Tamil, French, Japanese, Hindi, Chinese
